text:
OOO there's puddles on the floor,
Here we gooooo!,
WEEEEEEE!!!

Hmm... I wonder what this thingy does,
It's so weird looking,
Hehe it's so pretty too

Mommy & daddy are calling me,
I think it's dinner time!
I can't wait to fill my tummy up

Beep boop bop beep boop,
I am Robot Octocat,
Do you think it possible to have bugs if I'm made of..., 
METAL?!???

Mommy said I could be anyone I wanted to be,
So I chose to be Robin Hood like daddy, 
He always helps the poor, 
and gives to the ones that need the most, 
I want to be like daddy
